title: 起床战争怎么设置获胜了得到金币
author: 小酷最帅
txt_content: 起床获胜拆床什么的可以获得金币或者点券怎么设置，各位大佬求教！

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
# Game win
  # type: List<string>
  # Commands which will be executed for every player which wins
  # possible placeholders: {player}, {score}
  # set the first command to "none", no commands will be executed
  player-win:
    - /example {player} 200

配置文件里有这段，改命令就好了

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content: 你使用的是哪款起床插件？

replies.author: 小酷最帅
replies.txt_content:
XJue_DaDa 发表于 2019-2-23 12:41
你使用的是哪款起床插件？
起床战争1.3.4

replies.author: 小酷最帅
replies.txt_content: 大佬我还想问下，怎么设置开启观察者模式鸭
